Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper Freeware Vs Licensed

Compare features between Intermapper's freemium software and the licensed
solution.

Monitoring

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Robot Alert

Robot Alert sends and receives email, text, and SNMP messages in reaction to
IBM i events.

Automation

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper Getting Started Training Overview

Monitoring

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Robot Console

Robot Console is a fully automated, customizable tool that sends you only the
IBM i messages you need to see. This makes your monitoring more effective—you
won’t miss crucial information—and more efficient.

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Powertech Authority Broker for IBM i

Satisfy your auditor requirements with reports that provide a complete audit
trail of privileged user activity with Powertech Authority Broker for IBM i.
Schedule a demo today.

Compliance

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Automate for Intermapper

Combine the power of Intermapper alerts and Automate scripts to implement
manual activities for you.

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper App for Splunk Enterprise

If you need proactive network monitoring and visual mapping, Intermapper will
give you real-time knowledge of your network, affordably and with seamless
integration into Splunk.

Monitoring

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper Flows

Intermapper Flows is a tightly integrated component of Intermapper’s network
monitoring, mapping, and alerting suite of tools.

Monitoring

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper Remote Access

Intermapper Remote Access extends the reach of Intermapper by giving you and
your staff access to maps, submaps, and configuration options, regardless of
your location.

Monitoring

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper

Intermapper is an enterprise monitoring, mapping, and alerting tool that helps
network administrators maintain healthy IT environments.

Monitoring

###  Robot Console

Robot Console is a fully automated, customizable tool that sends you only the
IBM i messages you need to see. This makes your monitoring more effective—you
won’t miss crucial information—and more efficient.

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Powertech Authority Broker for IBM i

Satisfy your auditor requirements with reports that provide a complete audit
trail of privileged user activity with Powertech Authority Broker for IBM i.
Schedule a demo today.

Compliance

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Automate for Intermapper

Combine the power of Intermapper alerts and Automate scripts to implement
manual activities for you.

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

Datasheet

Datasheet

###  Intermapper App for Splunk Enterprise

If you need proactive network monitoring and visual mapping, Intermapper will
give you real-time knowledge of your network, affordably and with seamless
integration into Splunk.

Monitoring

![](/themes/custom/fortra_parent_2022/images/fta-delta-green-resource-
default.svg)

###  Intermapper Flows

Intermapper Flows is a tightly integrated component of Intermapper’s network
monitoring, mapping, and alerting suite of tools.

Monitoring

default.svg)

###  Intermapper Remote Access

Intermapper Remote Access extends the reach of Intermapper by giving you and
your staff access to maps, submaps, and configuration options, regardless of
your location.

Monitoring
